channel.description: Recent content in car on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-23
item.description: Spotify Car Thing is a $90 thing that plays Spotify in your car (2 minute read) Spotify has released its Car Thing dashboard smart music player.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-28
item.description: LinkedIn rolls out its freelance services marketplace globally after picking up 2M users in smaller US beta (4 minute read) LinkedIn is opening up its Service Marketplace, a service that lets freelancers advertise to those looking to hire people for short-term engagements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-14
item.description: Spotifyâ€™s Car Thing debuts as a limited release for selected US users (4 minute read) Car Thing is a Spotify-only voice-controlled device for cars.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-07
item.description: Driving the Polestar 2, the first electric car with a brain by Google (8 minute read) The Polestar 2 is a new luxury electric vehicle from Volvo.
